com.envibe.envibe.dao

Class CachedItemDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.envibe.envibe.dao.CachedItemDao

  • @Repository
public class CachedItemDao
extends Object
    Data access object for CachedItems that are stored in a Redis-compatible datastore. Utilizes CRUD model.
    Author:
    ARMmaster17

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PURPOSE_GENERAL_CACHE
      Global tag for cached items that are not connected to a specific service.
      static String PURPOSE_NEWS_FEED_CACHE
      Global tag for cached items that are produced and consumed by the news feed service.
      static String PURPOSE_NEWS_FEED_WORKER_PASSTHROUGH
      Global tag for cached items that need to be passed from frontend to threaded workers.
      private org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate<String,Object> redisTemplate
      Injected Redis connection object to run queries against.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(@NotNull
                   @NotNull CachedItem cachedItem)
        Creates a cached item using a generated tag.
        Parameters:
        cachedItem - Item to store in the application-wide cache.

      • read

        public CachedItem read(@NotNull
                       @NotNull String tag)
        Finds a cache item with given key.
        Parameters:
        tag - Access key for item. Usually follows the PURPOSE|USER schema. See generateTag(String, String).
        Returns:
        Selected cache item (if it exists).

      • readAndDelete

        public CachedItem readAndDelete(@NotNull
                                @NotNull String tag)
        Finds a cache item with a given key and deletes the entry immediately before returning the found value. Reduces risk of duplicate threads or race conditions or deadlock.
        Parameters:
        tag - Access key for item. Usually follows the PURPOSE|USER schema. See generateTag(String, String).
        Returns:
        Selected cache item (if it exists). Is deleted before it is returned.

      • update

        public void update(@NotNull
                   @NotNull CachedItem cachedItem)
        Updates the given cache item in the application-wide cache.
        Parameters:
        cachedItem - Valid CachedItem with updated payload. The purpose and user_tag fields must be the original values for the update to work.

      • delete

        public void delete(@NotNull
                   @NotNull CachedItem cachedItem)
        Removes the given cache item from the application-wide cache. Item must exist and contain the original purpose and user_tag values for the operation to be valid.
        Parameters:
        cachedItem - Item to delete.

      • delete

        public void delete(@NotNull
                   @NotNull String tag)
        Removes a cache item from the application-wide cache with the given key.
        Parameters:
        tag - Access key for item. Usually follows the PURPOSE|USER schema. See generateTag(String, String).

      • generateTag

        public String generateTag(@NotNull
                          @NotNull String purpose,
                          @NotNull
                          @NotNull String user_tag)
        Generates a searchable tag for a cache item.
        Parameters:
        purpose - Service that this item should be attached to. See the static fields for valid values.
        user_tag - User that this item should be attached to.
        Returns:
        Generated search tag that can be used for CRUD operations. Schema follows the PURPOSE|USER format.

      • generateTag

        private String generateTag(@NotNull
                           @NotNull CachedItem cachedItem)
        Generates a searchable tag for a cache item.
        Parameters:
        cachedItem - Object to pull parameters from to generate search tag.
        Returns:
        Generated search tag that can be used for CRUD operations. Schema follows the PURPOSE|USER format.
